mainSequence.step: Brenna initializes the week by calling the Planner to initialize the week.
Brenna filters recipes in the Library based on certain criteria.
Brenna adds a recipe to the Meal Plan.
Brenna edits a recipe in the Meal Plan.
Brenna adds a new item (wine) to the Meal Plan.
List retrieves items from the Board.
List gets items from the Meal Plan.
